title: OANDA Opens FCA-Registered Crypto Trading Platform in the UK
description: OANDA Crypto is the summation of last yearâ€™s acquisition of a majority stake in FCA-registered crypto firm Coinpass, and will offer trading in over 63 cryptocurrency pairs, including Bitcoin, Ether, and Ripple.

title: New AI and hardware may crack the code on lost crypto
description:
The following is a guest post from Robert Rhodin, the CEO of KeychainX. As the crypto market’s capitalization has grown, the diversity and complexity of assets also increase. This growth, supported by advanced technology and innovations, also increases the number of lost or inaccessible assets. It is estimated that hundreds of billions of dollars of […]

The post New AI and hardware may crack the code on lost crypto appeared first on CryptoSlate.
